events.comment: This is the main functions for the Player 1 Attacking Event. to Attack in game press the K Button

sub-events.comment: this file contains the main Attacking events for player 1

event-group.description: the main attacking fuction for the base form in game
event-group.title: Base_Attacking_Event

sub-events.comment: Left_Punch
The Main_Elements for the Left Punching Ability
This event is the main event for the attacking collisions and animations
This event is for when The Light hit counter restarts for the attacking animations
This event takes the light hit counter back to zero when the attack button isnt pressed
Right_Punch
The Main_Elements for the Right Punching Ability
This event is the main event for the attacking collisions and animations
This event is for when The Light hit counter restarts for the attacking animations
This event takes the light hit counter back to zero when the attack button isnt pressed

event-group.description: the main attacking fuction for the Super Sayian form in game
event-group.title: SSJ1_Attacking_Event

event-group.description: This folder is for when the players attacking animations end and they need to back to there previous state that they were in.
event-group.title: end of attack frame

sub-events.comment: This event is for when the players attack animation ends and it is put back into its original state

event-group.description: the end of the attack frames for the P1 base form
event-group.title: P1_end of attack frame Base Form

sub-events.comment: This Event is for when the flying function is enabled and the attack animation ends

event-group.description: when the attack animations end while the player is flying
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Fly

sub-events.comment: This Event if when the attack animation ends and they are on the ground

event-group.description: when the attack animation is finished on the ground
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Ground

sub-events.comment: This Event if for when they finish attacking while they are falling in the air

event-group.description: When the attack animations end in the air
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Air

sub-events.comment: This event is for when the players attack animation ends and it is put back into its original state

event-group.description: the end of the attack frames for the P1 base form
event-group.title: P1_end of attack frame SSJ1 Form

sub-events.comment: This Event is for when the flying function is enabled and the attack animation ends

event-group.description: when the attack animations end while the player is flying
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Fly_SSJ1

sub-events.comment: This Event if when the attack animation ends and they are on the ground

event-group.description: when the attack animation is finished on the ground
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Ground_SSJ1

sub-events.comment: This Event if for when they finish attacking while they are falling in the air

event-group.description: When the attack animations end in the air
event-group.title: P1_Attack_End_Frames_Air_SSJ1
